campaign.story:
Try the alpha version of the demo on Gamejolt
[NOTE] The game will be translated into English, French, Spanish, and more!
 Contribute to making my dreams of making Aveliana come true!
Before you start reading, why not playing an extract of the main theme soundtrack? 
What is Aveliana?
A few genres in indie videogames are overrepresented such as platformer, Metroidvania, or rogue-like! With Aveliana I want to bring novelty to indie games with fun and original gameplay! Aveliana is an infiltration-action-adventure game!
JUMP INTO THE ADVENTURE AND PLAY THE DEMO ON Gamejolt!. 
Aveliana is a 2.5D game with unique gameplay: based on the detection pattern of enemies, you find your own route through the world. All the enemies can be avoided in the idea of a commandos-like. The gameplay is ultra-dynamic because it is focused on a single character, Aveliana. 
(This trailer was selected as "best indie game trailer" by Best Indie Games!)  
If you feel one path is too complicated or you want to explore a new route, it is always possible to find a secret path, in which the game smoothly transition from 2.5D to a 2D platformer. And if you are tremendous, you can choose to stand and fight your enemies!
The gameplay is constantly renewed in Aveliana thanks to the many enemies that I have crafted for you. Each of them has a different detection and attack pattern. Tall enemies, like robots, can not be directly targeted because they are too tall. However, Aveliana has other tricks in her bag. All along with the game, you will also unlock new abilities to build your character. 
 Don't you love hiding in high-grass?
PLAY

Aveliana is also a game with beautiful environments that you will want to explore to discover all the secrets of the game (and you can contribute to it in some rewards!). Each level has a different environment and atmosphere. Sometimes, after an action-packed sequence, you will have the joy to admire the landscape before continuing the adventure! After a long journey in an environment entirely hand-drawn, you will face fierce and unique bosses!
2.5D / isometric view environments:
2D environments:
 Note: you don't like too difficult games and you just want to know Aveliana's story and discover the levels? No worries, there will be a "story mode" for you! 
The game will be initially released on Steam and will support Windows, Linux and Mac. Later it could be ported to consoles.
Elevator pitch
Aveliana is an action-infiltration-adventure game recognizable by its art design as well as for its fun and unique gameplay!
Embrace Aveliana’s quest to bring back someone she has lost! The game takes place alternatively in an isometric or a 2D point of view and is fast-paced. Guide her through arduous paths watched by monsters, follow the trace of a mysterious fox, and find the powerful artifacts she is looking for at the core of wonderful temples. Will you stealth your way to victory? Seek a forgotten path on the edge of a cliff? Or stand and fight against your enemies? The choice is yours!
 PRESS KIT
What are my inspirations?
Just before starting the game development, I was playing a series of games that probably initiated the thought process in my mind. I played Zelda Breath of the wild, Celeste, Cuphead, Disco Elysium, and finally Children of Morta. I am also inspired by other games such as Gris, Commandos, Rayman origins, and of course Zelda Ocarina of time! Other arts also inspire me, such as painting or music, but also poetry, and anime (in particular Miyasaki's work that I find unique and so poetic!).
What makes Aveliana unique?
The gameplay, the story, and the art style!
2.5D to 2D smooth transition! You can find hidden 2D passages but if you fall, you may fall onto enemies:
PLAY

Unique and diverse stealth gameplay
Precise and fast gameplay for experts (speedrunners!), and adjustable for occasional gamers
A recognizable artistic design
Hand-drawn environments with a lot of variety
A meaningful story with a lot of story twists
Choose your set of skills for the adventure
In Aveliana, at the start of each level, you can reassign your abilities and adapt the set of skills to the upcoming level and to your playstyle. For instance, here the first ability I have chosen (which is the one by default in the demo) is the Dash ability because I like to move quickly, but I could have chosen the Hard skin instead to take less damages. For each slot, you will have to choose between two options! 
Foes in Aveliana 
All enemies in Aveliana have their own detection and attack pattern! The game already has three "common" enemies that detect you with a cone (like the yellow guys in the little video below)! Each of them will be of a different type (melee, zone, ranged)!
Here you can see the new ranged enemy I have just implemented (quite challenging to fight for me):
PLAY

 It also already has 7 unique and more challenging enemies, like the ones below, that will force you to modify your approach and think about your movements! Look at the rewards because you could participate in the development of more enemies like this!
 (this one below you can only see when you are on specific spots where you can activate your medallion)
(that one makes a circle around you and you have to stay in it!)
PLAY

And finally, we have already three unique bosses in the game! One more is programmed!
All this variety in terms of detection and attack patterns is excellent for renewing the gaming experience all along with the game! The enemies can combine in fun and original ways to surprise you at all moments!
What about the story?
While looking for three artifacts, Aveliana will wander a poetic yet dangerous world and discover about her and her environment! As an indie game developer and following my personal thoughts about our world, I wish to use the videogame as a medium to share and carry meaningful messages. As a scientist, what passionate me the most is how a bunch of atoms can come to live, think, eat, love, etc. Aveliana is a strong and reckless bunch of pixels; she is guided by a fox and she starts to understand who she is thanks to him! The whole artistic design, being minimalistic and poetic, has been thought for you to enter into Aveliana’s story and to live a great experience!
[Work in progress] In-game, if you want to get more details about the story, you can use your medallion and scan around to find hidden little NPCs that will give you the precious information:
PLAY

 Who is Thefrenchdev? 
I'm Romain, a French man from La Rochelle (France). I'm 32 and I have started this project at the end of February 2020 and I literally fell in love with game development. Since then, I have been working on Aveliana every day during my free time (from 6 pm to midnight). It has become my passion and the development has gone so well that I have quickly been able to share playable demos with people. This has motivated me, even more, to continue working on it and make it as fun, interesting, and enjoyable as possible.
 I jumped into game development suddenly but I have a background in programming since I am a theoretical physicist and I have painted and drawn all my life. This has helped me a lot during the whole journey since I haven't had to remove any good idea for the game because of technical limitations.
I am doing this project solo but I receive a lot of support and help from my wife, Fanny. We did a lot of brainstorming for the story and we often discuss artistic and gameplay ideas!
They loved the game! 
The Escapist has selected the game for The Escapist Game Showcase!
 Gamejolt has selected Aveliana to be featured as an Indie Gem! "YOU are an indie gem! Really excited to follow along on your progress!" 
The game was selected in a video by Best Indie Games!
All these awesome guys including IndieGameiacs!
 Why I am doing this Kickstarter? 
By backing the project, you can really make it outstanding and support a solo indie dev who put all his heart into it! If the game release is successful, maybe I can make my dream come true and become a game developer! 
First, for the game development, I want to invest in a new computer because the one I am currently using has neither a great GPU nor CPU. This would help me to be more efficient in game making and game testing (which is an important upcoming phase). For now, it suffers a bit when I need to test the game having other software opened (Unity3D, Photoshop, etc.)!
One big reason to kickstart this project is that I would like to raise funds to attend game events and promote the game. I think many beautiful indie games have been forgotten because no one knew they ever existed. Going to such an event costs about 1-2 K$ for the registration fee, the transportation (when we are able to travel again), and a hotel room.
Then I would like to be able to afford to pay the people who are gratefully contributing to the game. I am specifically thinking about game music. I think the music is so great that the composer deserves more than what she is asking for.
I bought a few days ago instruments and tools to make and register music (a workstation, a MIDI controller, a sound card, a DAW software, and an amp)! But who will make this music and why? Well, my wife plays the piano very well and I play guitar so we want to make additional music for the game that will be played procedurally. This means, the current music will be used as intro/outro tracks and for special events in the game and the new music will vary depending on what you do! For instance, if you encounter a lot of enemies, the rhythm and instruments in the track will change. I hope this will create a unique atmosphere and I think I have not seen this kind of thing in a game! I am really excited about it and I will use part of the Kickstarter funds for the things I have bought.
 I really want to make a Switch version for the game, and reaching the main goal and then the stretch goal for it would convince me totally to do it! Plus, I have been accepted (in just 3 days!) as a Switch developer (this means they really loved my project)! I will surely dedicate some funds to the port to this console.
The Kickstarter goal of 12K will greatly help me with this project! It will also unlock the Kraken (a unique mini-boss that I will design, draw, and implement in the game!).
The two stretch goals are important bonuses! The first one is a totally new world and environment for the game that I will draw, design, and implement! This is a mock-up of an environment that I want to create: 
PLAY

 The second stretch goal will unlock the voice-over for the English version! I would love so much to have voices for the game story. 
A new and unique reward!
I have added a new reward called "The music lover" which is unique and is a big support for me! 
For the game, I want to continue working with Ally, who is making awesome tracks, and I want, with my wife, to create new music that will be used during the levels and will be generated procedurally. This means the music will change accordingly to what is happening with smooth transitions. For this, I borrowed some money to pay for a midi keyboard, a sound card and to pay for the 16-tracks version of Bitwig (it is a DAW, a software to create music). All the funds from this reward will be used used to reimburse the instruments and to pay for the upgraded version of Bitwig (I have found some really awesome sounds that can only be used in the "studio edition" and tested (but can't be saved) in the "demo version"). This is why this reward is unique and matters so much for me: it will contribute to an extremely important piece of the game! If you love music and game music this one is for you! You will have access to all the soundtracks that we will make thanks to your contribution and we can discuss about game music during a discussion.
(you can make your design)
BONUS: The music lover is the only one who will be able to add a bonus to his pledge to order a unique Vinyl of Aveliana's soundtracks! The design isn't definitive and because it will be edited only once, you'll be able to choose your image of the game for the cover and the sticker.
Physical rewards! (organic/environment-friendly materials)
I have prepared rewards with a lot of attention and I hope you will love them!
First of all, all ranks have access to a digital version of the game when it will be released!  
 A reward for everyone: If we reach the first Kickstarter goal, I will implement the Kraken into the game! Alongside much other stuff for which you can contribute!
Discover the rewards!
The design of the tote bag and Aveliana's portrait illustration has been done in collaboration with LesPetitsMo who is an awesome french artist I've discovered during the game development! 
The other designs are the artworks I have done for the game. The scene with Aveliana and the fox is my absolute favorite, I have spent 10 hours on it! I also love the T-shirt design with Aveliana surrounded by many little details that correspond to the lore of the game (e.g. the fox, the medaillon). If you choose a reward with an illustration please contact me in order to tell me which one you prefer! (non-definitive designs)
T-shirt (choose your design)

Tote bag (design LesPetitsMo)
Prints (size approx. 21x31 cm)
Contribute to the game creation! 
I have prepared contributive rewards so you can participate in the game making!
Write a piece of text that will be added (on my approval) in the game! 
It can be a side-story, a joke, a quote, a poem, anything you'd like! People will be able to read it in the game and you will be credited in the game! Characters in the game will talk about your legend, or have a laugh when reading your funny joke. I think this is really a unique way of adding your name to the game!
Design a new mini-boss or enemy for the game!
We will discuss and collaborate to make a new and awesome new monster for the game. Your contribution can be either sketch, drawings, animations, or just ideas of an awesome monster that would make the quest of Aveliana even more arduous!

Why doing eco-friendly rewards and at what cost? 
I have decided to make the rewards as respectful as possible of the environment because this is something that matters to me! I also wanted to have good fabric for the T-shirt, tote bag, and high-quality paper and printing for the illustrations. For this, I have decided not to increase the reward prices thus it will slightly reduce the margin I will get from physical rewards. For you, it's all beneficial and I hope you will appreciate it!
 Share the news and join us on social media! 
Since I have started the project, about 7 months ago, I have grown a community of more than 8K followers on Instagram, Twitter, and Discord. This has been an exceptional journey with a lot of awesome feedback. I would love it if you'd like to participate in it, follow me, discuss with me, and make the game even greater than it is right now! And you can find news about the game, about the Kickstarter, about Steam release, etc.
For the launch of the Kickstarter, I am going to start a fanart challenge! There is nothing to earn and it is all for fun (to thank all the artists that are following me)! The last events I organized received the participation of over a hundred people (#thefrenchdevDTIYS on Instagram)!  Check for more info on my social media!
Remember you can wishlist the game on Steam!
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! MERCI!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always risks when doing such a big project alone. However, I have managed to progress a lot already on the game development and there are already many milestones that have been reached (getting a Steam page, making a demo, etc.).

At which stage am I in the project and what is the plan?
Even if this is my first game development project, I think I know from the start where I am going and what is the scope of the game. This has helped me to always be on time with my schedule, and even be in advance on many aspects (for instance the IA of the game is already done, the game mechanics and the physics is coded, I have already about 18 levels that are completed and ready for polishing, etc.).
I have started the game development on the 23rd of February and after about 1 month, I have started to send versions to people on my social media so they could try it and give me feedback. I got a lot of positive feedback and bugs to solve. After 2 months of game development, I have proposed a "pre-alpha mockup" on Gamejolt, which has been played more than 250 times! I received a ton of really good feedback and this demo was stable. Then I focused on doing a real demo for the game, the one you can find now on Gamejolt. This version is a glimpse at what will be the game in terms of story, art design, gameplay...

Now for the next 6 months, I want to focus on drawing all the levels of the game (about 25 for about 6-7 hours of estimated gameplay). On the fly, I will of course add new enemies, implement the story, and add features (such as unlocking new abilities for Aveliana). After this, I will enter the final phase of the game development and during the last 6 months, I will focus on polishing everything. Playtest the game a lot and finish the drawings, animations, cutscenes...

I think I can say now that the game will be finished because the project is sufficiently advanced and I see where I am going with it. All the stages have been completed ahead of time until now. 
The current version of the game is playable and stable, it is just too short and it doesn't carry yet the story I want to tell! This Kickstarter can really help me to do even more stuff for the game and reach another level of quality!

MERCI, THANKS, GRACIAS (these are the three languages I know :)) GRAZIE, ESKERRIK ASKO, DANKE, OBRIGADO (for those I don't need google translate), etc.

campaign.story:
We’ve Been Funded. See Our Stretch Goals!
Kickstarter Loves Our Project and We Love Our Supporters
ABOUT THE AUTHORS
Our authors are a father, Curtis, and daugther, Ruby (2), who are creating a series of children’s books inspired by the whimsical conversations that followed when Ruby asked “would fox eat orange.” The stories are designed to remind everyone to appreciate the little whimsical moments in their day and to stop and smell (or eat) the roses that life has to offer.
Curtis and Ruby
REPRESENTATION MATTERS
Did you know: Black, Latino, and Native Authors combined wrote only 7% of the new children’s books published in 2017, according to The Diversity Gap in Children’s Books, 2018, Lee & Low Books.
Representation means more than simply including or promoting images of people of color. It also means promoting thoughts, stories, and adventures created from the fertile and unique imaginations of people of color.
 Fox Eats is an opportunity for readers to follow the unique imaginations of an African-American father and daugther. 

ABOUT THE INSPIRATION
The year 2020 was a tough time for family trips, social gatherings, family outings and was an overall lull for most joys of life. Curtis noticed that, despite the world going on pause, Ruby’s curiosity in the fine details of the world was incessant and her thirst for learning and growing did not take a break simply because the amusement parks and grand events had shuttered their doors. 
 One day Ruby asked ‘would fox eat orange?’ Daddy almost said no because he wasn’t sure what a fox might or might not eat. On another occasion at the park, Ruby asked if fox might eat a soccer ball, or green grass, or a big butterfly. At the pumpkin patch, she declared confidently that fox would eat a pumpkin because fox likes the seeds and the bumps on the pumpkin.
 Curtis and Ruby took this wondrous curiosity and love of learning to create the Fox Eats series. The little fox in our stories reminds readers of the youthful curiousity within all of us. We too can see the world with renewed perspective each day and follow our hunger to learn more!  
ABOUT BOOK 1: FOX EATS A RAINBOW
The first book, Fox Eats A Rainbow, is currently available on Amazon and follows our curious little fox as it discovers a rainbow for the first time and decides to take a bite. Readers follow the little fox on this poetic adventure learning the colors of the rainbow based in part on Ruby and Curtis’ whimsical conversations about what fox would eat.  
Fox Eats A Rainbow (Cover Design)
The little fox is on the move
Sees a Rainbow!
Fox Eats Orange
Look what happens when Fox Eats Orange!
WHAT YOUR CONTRIBUTION MEANS
We hope to continue the Fox Eats series. Your contribution will fund the illustrations and printing costs for Books 2 and 3.
Each dollar you pledge means we are one step closer to making the Fox Eats dream come true. Too often, especially among people of color, our children’s voices and thoughts and imaginations are suppressed and forced into quiet corners. The stories in Fox Eats are inspired by the wonder, closeness, and love that can only be felt in the quiet conversations between parent and child. We hope to inspire families around the world to let the parent-child stories, imaginations, and joy run freely and openly.
 HOW WILL WE USE YOUR PLEDGE?
Your funding would cover expenses for Book 2 and 3 in the following way:
Illustrations - 40%
Printing - 35%
Content Creation And Marketing - 20%
Kickstarter Fees - 5%
STRETCH GOALS 
Updated After Reaching Our Funding Goal!
We are so happy to update our stretch goals in light of reaching our funding goal!
If we are fortunate to reach the below overfunding milestones, we would be able to grow the Fox Eats stories in powerfully unique ways.
[Giving Back!] $3,000 - We will donate 25 books to charities and educational institutions in the Austin, TX area!
[More Giving Back] $4,000 - We will offer giveaways and donate a combination of 100 books to families in need and educational institutions Nationwide!
[Growing Fox Eats] $5,000 - Release hardcover editions of Book 1 and Book 2
[Reaching More Readers] $10,000 - Create an audiobook version of our stories to support persons of unique circumstances
[Growing Fox Eats] $15,000 - Animate Fox Eats A Rainbow and make content available on Youtube

campaign.story:
Did you know that Mama Orangutans stay by their babies for up to 7 years? They teach them where to find food, what to eat and how to build a sleeping nest. Well I didn't, until I was lucky enough to take a field trip in Sumatra, Indonesia. The reason I had the pleasure to go on this trip was because I work with wildlife and nature conservation at WWF International. 
Let’s start from the beginning. Once upon a time, there was an island called Sumatra. It was completely covered in rainforest, inhabited by all kinds of weird and wonderful wildlife – including orangutans, dubbed by natives ‘men of the forest’ for their uncanny similarity to humans. The rainforest was so thick that the natives said orangutans were able to cross the whole island, swinging from tree to tree, never touching the ground.
And then palm oil arrived.
I wrote this story shortly after my visit because I was shocked at the rate of deforestation in Sumatra and saddened that the Orangutans have declined by around 50% in the last 60 years.
Bing is about to leave his cosy nest for the first time and take a swing into the wild Indonesian forest. He encourages bravery, determination and imagination.
Young readers of all ages will find that it’s not all doom and gloom out there – and that your imagination can be the key to solving the problems facing our world today.
The book is approximately 95% complete pending any minor alterations. The book will only be printed on-demand to avoid paper from continuing to incentivise deforestation. Please think twice before acquiring a physical copy.
The writing sets you deep in the forest and pulls you in through a clever and daring story told in rhyme. Your child will quickly find themselves lost in Aneta Neuman’s extraordinary detail of the jungle. It's a page-turning experience that is sure to awaken a wildling.
Perfect for girls and boys ages 4-10.
Size: 8in x 10in, 22 pages.
Additional activity pages and resources to talk to your child about deforestation will be available to help you learn and enhance topics children are learning in school these days.
Investing in the creation of this book will help me fund final illustrations, initial printing, marketing and creating future books in the Wee Wild World series. Every plush and keyring package purchased will aid wildlife conservation projects.
About Wee Wild World: Nature conservation stories of friendship, bravery and hope. Mildly touching on complex topics and encouraging young naturalists and wildlings on a journey into a world where they feel inspired to become problem solvers, change-makers and innovators.
Lastly, don't forget to follow Bing and his friends’ adventures on Instagram
I'm truly grateful for your generosity and support
Thank you!

campaign.story:
ABOUT THE BOOK
Slothee Wants Coffee is the first of the Slothee and Friends books. These books will guide children, and adults alike, through worldly adventures, learning about different cultures, and making friends. Future books will include more coffee explorations, surfing adventures, and more. 
In Slothee Wants Coffee, Slothee travels from Costa Rica to Brazil, Colombia, Indonesia, Ethiopia, and Hawaii in search of the perfect cup of coffee. On the way, he meets new friends and learns about coffee and culture. Will Slothee find the best cup of coffee? Read this book to join him on an educational, yet fun adventure!
Featured on Yahoo News, MSN, The Patch, and Oncenoticias

THE INSPIRATION 
After traveling domestically and internationally, the inspiration behind 'Slothee Wants Coffee' comes from the love of exploration (and coffee)! As a single mom, my goal is to set my son up for success and allow him to experience new surroundings. Slothee and Slothee's mom represent that relationship and desire to encourage learning through discovery.
On a trip to Costa Rica, we fell in love with sloths, seeing them in the rainforests and watching their slow, yet smooth movements. It is our spirit-animal! After taking a coffee (and chocolate) tour, we learned that there is much more than just brewing a cup of coffee. From bean to your cup, it is a process. We wanted to bring that process to life and add fun facts in the book that kids can understand and relate to.
Throughout this book, we hope to excite children and parents to explore cultures outside of the norm. Not only will you meet Slothee's friends, but you will learn about coffee and traditions. Travel virtually to different countries with Slothee!

SNEAK PEEK
*The sample pages below are not in order and are being shared to give you a glimpse into the overall style.

BEHIND THE SCENES
Publishing a book is a process. In fact, 'Slothee Wants Coffee' became an idea one year exactly from when it will be printed and shipped. From writing to editing, illustrations to formatting, printing to shipping, and research in-between every step, it is not an easy process for a first-time author. However, it is a dream. With every emotion came a sigh of relief, knowing that it is a process and the end result will outweigh the many sleepless nights of working on this passion.

THE AUTHORS
Nikki Pezzopane
Nikki is originally from Metro Detroit but moved to Arizona in high school. She attended Northern Arizona University in Flagstaff, receiving a Bachelor's in Criminal Justice and Criminology. Nikki also earned a Master's in Forensic Psychology from Argosy University. However, she realized her heart wasn't with her degree path and took a different route in life by starting a Digital Marketing/Social Media Management company in 2014. Nikki always had a love for writing, even at a young age, so she was inspired by Cameron's idea, and together they wrote Slothee Wants Coffee. She also has a passion for travel, having traveled to 38 states and 16 countries. 

Cameron Fica
Cameron has a passion for traveling and went on an airplane for the first time at 3-months old. He is 8-years old, has lived in 3 states, and traveled to 14 countries and 22 states. Cameron loves sloths and came up with the idea of Slothee Wants Coffee during a trip to Costa Rica. He also loves playing on the beach, science experiments, and playing Roblox.

Keep in touch with the authors, and find more of their work here:
Email: slotheewantscoffee@gmail.com
Facebook: @slotheewantscoffee
Instagram: @slotheewantscoffee

THE ILLUSTRATOR
Yury from Yury Illustration is an illustrator based in Europe. Since at an early age, besides drawing she began painting in oil and many other traditional mediums. When she is not drawing, she enjoys traveling, cooking, board games, and bicycle rides. She is a lover of the outdoors, nature, animals, diversity, meeting new people, and exploring new cultures. Her love for art led her to study and graduate as an architect at the university. Today, she is dedicated to helping others bring their words to life through illustrations. She has illustrated children’s books that are available through Amazon, Walmart, and Barnes & Noble.

      Keep in touch with the illustrator, and find more of her work here:
      Email: yuryillustration@gmail.com
      Facebook: @yuryillustration
      Instagram: @yuryillustration

THE BOOK
TIMELINE
January 2021 - Kickstarter campaign
January 2021  - Final revisions made and manuscript sent to the printers
January/February 2021 - Books will be printed and shipped from the printers.
February 2021 - Rewards received and prepared to ship.
March/April 2021 -Special delivery to your mailbox!  Books arrive from the printers and are sent out, along with other rewards, to our backers.

THE GOAL
Our budget breakdown is as follows:
55% of funds will go towards the printing, shipping, and publishing of 'Slothee Wants Coffee'.
20% of funds will go towards the marketing of 'Slothee Wants Coffee'.
10% of funds will go towards the development of our next Slothee and Friends books, where we will introduce new characters to represent different countries and cultures.
10% of funds will go towards Kickstarter fees.
5% of funds will go towards merch.
Please remember that Kickstarter has an all or nothing approach. If we do not reach my goal, none of this project will be funded.

FUNDING ALLOCATION

PLEDGES
MERCH
The Slothee Wants Coffee Mug
The Slothee Wants Coffee Tote


The Slothee Wants Coffee Luggage Tag (with every order!)
HOW TO HELP GET THE MESSAGE OUT
Thanks for stopping by and THANK YOU so much for your support!  We hope that this book brings your family a sense of adventure and becomes a new favorite in your home! If you have any questions, please send us a message.

campaign.story:
This Kickstarter campaign is an experiment designed to answer the question, "Can you launch a new SciFi comic series without any spoilers?" 
The answer is technically "no" because, just by posting the project image and video for this #make100, you can already tell that the first issue of The Lump Sum Saga involves space exploration, and there may be astronauts involved.
But can a creator make that comic available to the public without spoiling all of the surprises in the book? I think so. I hope so. Our 12-page comic includes deliberate twists and a Twilight Zone feel, so the fewer spoilers, the better.
Only time and your support can confirm my hypothesis.
THE REWARDS 
There are only three reward tiers in this short #make100 campaign: one for readers, one for curious "process lovers," and one for collectors.
ABOUT THE LUMP SUM SAGA UNIVERSE
The Lump Sum Saga started as the story of Lump Man®. I was struggling to flesh out my hero's origin story and getting nowhere fast. 
And then Mars Curiosity Rover happened.
Imagine having the success or failure of your entire life's work coming down to one breathless moment in time. The brief seconds before Curiosity reached the surface of Mars were the scientist equivalent of being in the middle of a gold medal high dive at the Olympics. I will always remember the JPL team's shouts of joy and relief that filled the room when they finally received confirmation that they had "stuck the landing." To this day, it still makes me well up remembering the pure emotion of that moment. I needed that for my story.
What began as a fairly standard superhero story ultimately became a story of fearless space exploration and first contact. The story has haunted me for years now. 
Ironically, you will not meet Lump Man in this issue. Or even the next. But you will meet characters who personify the same deep commitment to the exploration of another planet that I saw at the Jet Propulsion Lab the day Curiosity landed.  
 THE TEAM BEHIND THE LUMP SUM SAGA 
How do you ensure that your first comic maintains a certain level of professional quality? My approach was to work with industry professionals who have WAY more experience and "cred" than I do. I am proud to have collaborated with so many talented co-creators. Here is our team:
THERE IS A PRINTED COMIC COMING BUT...
The floppy edition of issue #1 of The Lump Sum Saga, Prologue: Only the Fate of Our World, will be released later this year. However, this digital campaign will let you become one of the first to discover the TLSS universe, without major spoilers, months before others have the print edition in their hands.
Thank you so much for your support of this campaign. When you click on the "Back This Project" button, you are helping to bring The Lump Sum Saga universe to life and, for that, I am eternally grateful. Thank you for joining this launch.
campaign.risks:

“Prologue: Only the Fate of our World,” issue 1 of The Lump Sum Saga, is already written, pencilled, inked, coloured, and lettered and the digital and printed components of the project are already on hand and ready for distribution.
The greatest risk facing the project is actually the postal service. We have never sent the postcards with an attached micro-comic before. How the product arrives is likely to vary significantly by jurisdiction but it is certain that this reward will not arrive in mint condition. Be sure to set your expectations accordingly.

campaign.story:
Hey everyone, and welcome back to our 16th Kickstarter!  
We are so excited to get the opportunity to distract you all from the madness going in the world and offer you our latest campaign! The crew at PAPERFILMS continues our exciting new project that we think you will love, featuring some of the top talent in the field to present the LAST TWO issues of an ADULTS ONLY comic mini-series called POP KILL ! 
POP KILL is Written by JIMMY [ Painkiller Jane, Harley Quinn, Jonah Hex ] PALMIOTTI and DAVE [ 100 Bullets, Red Son ] JOHNSON and illustrated by the amazing JUAN [ Painkiller Jane, Twilight Experiment ] SANTACRUZ with colors by BRIAN [ X-Men, Bloodshot ] REBER, lettering by SEAN [ Aliens, Aliens vs Predator ] KONOT and the brilliant design by JOHN J HILL , the man responsible for so many great projects there are too many to list, but for the PAPERFILMS projects, he designed the PAINKILLER JANE Hardcover and the KILLING TIME IN AMERICA hardcover.

We decided to make this last Kickstarter campaign a super special one that features the last two issues of the POP KILL series at one time and even more exciting, we have brought along some amazing, SUPERSTAR artists in the process to do a couple of variant covers.  BILL SIENKIEWICZ of Elektra: Assassin/New Mutants fame  and ADAM HUGHES of Catwoman and Wonder Woman fame have outdid themselves for all of us to enjoy!  These covers will be limited to this POP KILL Kickstarter only! 
We also have the award winning AMANDA CONNER on board to deliver us two brand new adult mystery covers as well. Anyone that has backed the last 2 Kickstarters already knows how super cool these exclusive AMANDA covers have been.
POP KILL #3 cover by Dave Johnson
New to our work and the campaign?  First off, welcome aboard and thanks for checking us out.  We have several options, both digital and physical that allow you to catch up on the full POP KILL series.  These are super limited, so get in while you can. 
For all you super collectors, we have a short amount of super limited tiers allowing you to back full variant set bundles from AMANDA CONNER to full super variant sets!  Along with those, we have some CGC Signature Series options for all those graded fans!
***ADD ONS:  Please see the below section regarding post-campaign ADD ON options***

THE STORY:
Imagine a world where the two dominant and competing Cola companies, each worth billions, are owned by former Siamese twins who are now separated and have grown to hate each other so much they hire assassins, saboteurs, and espionage personnel to meddle with each other on a daily basis.  This is the story about brotherly love run afoul, and the people they enlist to do their dirty work.
Meet the beautiful DINA DELUX, a scientist in the Fizz division at POPSO COLA. She's on the verge of creating a formula that will make soda 50% fizzier, keeping it carbonated longer than any other brand on the market. A breakthrough like this would put all the competition out of business in a heartbeat.
When Popso's main rival FIZZ ONE COLA hear the rumors about the discovery, they activate their best man, JON PYLE, an oversexed mercenary, to take care of the situation. His orders are to convince Dina to switch sides, and if that fails, to eliminate her. However, after they meet the attraction is undeniable and a third option kicks in, one which triggers repercussions from BOTH sides.
Each book you buy will come with an official CERTIFICATE OF AUTHENTICITY pictured below.  
STRETCH GOALS:
COVERS:
Here are just a few of the amazing covers you'll see with these issues from DAVE JOHNSON, ADAM HUGHES and BILL SIENKIEWICZ!

POP KILL #4 Cover by Dave Johnson
BILL SIENKIEWICZ Variant Cover
ADAM HUGHES Variant Cover
Super Secret Sexy covers by AMANDA CONNER
PREVIEW PAGES:
Take a look at some amazing interior artwork from Juan SantaCruz and Brian Rieber from the story!
REWARDS:
Below you will be able to see a visual of all of the great tiers we have available with this campaign for backing.  **Please note, some tiers are limited so please, read each tier description to the right carefully!**

 POST CAMPAIGN ADD ONS:
We are anticipating having some great Add On options for those backers.  We do stress, those tiers that contain limited covers for POP KILL #3  will not be offered in the ADD ON option!  Please do not request this, only available via the Complete Set option.  You'll be able to request and sample some of the other amazing PaperFilms projects and products post-campaign!  If we do have extra POP KILL #3 covers of all sorts, we will be able to provide that as ADD ON options on a first come, first serve basis!
After the campaign ends, we have teamed up with the kind people over at Crowd Ox to send you an extremely simple survey in order to collect the info we need to fulfill your rewards.
The invitation will be sent directly to the email address linked to your Kickstarter  account. Be sure to check your spam folder in case it was captured there!
What is Crowd Ox?
Crowd Ox gives you the opportunity to verify your reward, make your selections (i.e. choose a color, size, etc) as well as verify and validate your shipping address. On top of all that, you can also upgrade your pledge level or add additional items to your existing pledge!
You do not need to make a login and password in order to access your survey as you will receive an email with a unique link. If you want to go back to review your info, simply click on the link in your email again.
The entire POP KILL team truly appreciates your support on this (and last) campaign.  Your trust in our projects is monumental to our success.  Please feel free to share this campaign, tag us, Tweet about it to everyone!
THANK YOU FROM ALL OF THE POP KILL TEAM!!!

campaign.story:
Hi, I'm Sam, the Creator/Writer of Geek-Girl! I'm launching this Kickstarter to introduce GG to new readers and continue to expand the book's audience, and bring it closer to being in a position where I can keep those issues of Geek-Girl coming for as long as I like; further developing the weird and wonderful characters and concepts I'm so passionate about, and introducing new ones!
And if you're already on board the Geek-Girl series? Don't worry, we've got ya covered...
Geek-Girl's New Direction fronting a Super-Team STARTS HERE in the Jump-On issue #5, now Remastered and at an Extra-Sized 40 Pages - with Sketches and Previews for future Geek-Girl issues, a Preview of the next issue of Guest-Star Guano Guy's series, and a 7-Page story tying into the Geek-Girl series and introducing a character who will be coming to its pages in the future - plus Team Geek-Girl Ltd Print!
The Edition is Limited to only 500 Copies; Jump-On the acclaimed Geek-Girl series here!
Check out a Preview of the book below...
Say, why don't we meet the creative team - ? ...
"I'm Sam Johnson, the British creator/writer of Geek-Girl. I have a  Masters in Creative Writing for Film & TV and have been working in comics for over ten years. Among this work, I created Cabra Cini: Voodoo  Junkie Hitwoman, a character who had a strip annually in the Halloween issue of H!M Comics' IF-X anthology, and has now come into the Geek-Girl ongoing series. I have self-published two The Almighties one-shots (a comedy super-team co-created with Mike Gagnon); released a 4-issue Geek-Girl Mini-Series through publisher Markosia monthly from Nov 2016, and ran a successful Kickstarter for its TPB - which has now been followed with Geek-Girl's ongoing series.
"My favorite comic and biggest influence is Grant Morrison's bizarre run on Doom Patrol,  which has helped inspire a number of weird and wonderful creations that, now we're ongoing, I am going to be bringing to the pages of Geek-Girl. Weirdness such as The Hall of Diamonds, the Rat Fink and Groovejet: The  Living Party are all in GG's future, as  well as the aforementioned Cabra Cini."

Colombian C Granda is Geek-Girl's artist. His previous work  includes Grimm Fairy Tales, Charmed, and Pirouette.  Besides handling his own workload, Carlos is co-director of The National Comic  & Manga Hall and FICCO - groups dedicated to nurturing and exhibiting the artwork of local creators in Medellin. www.artstation.com/grandacomicfan

Geek-Girl Colorist Chunlin Zhao lives in Sichuan, China. She has been  coloring and illustrating comics since 2012, working on such comics as Wretches, The Misadventures of Electrolyte, and Shogun Knight Dyson V -  for publishers including Oddworld, Jackalope and Outland Entertainment.

Geek-Girl #5's cover is by Sun Khamunaki,  a comic cover artist & illustrator from Victoria BC Canada known for her fine art inspired style. Her works have graced the covers of Lady Death, Red Sonja, Vampirella, and various Zenescope titles including Oz and Van Helsing. www.sunkhamunaki.com
Geek-Girl's letterer Paul McLaren started off drawing comics as a  kid, with his school friend and fellow Scotsman Mark Millar (Kick-Ass,  Kingsman, Secret Service) - though went on to have a career in the police. He left the Police Service to work in the Middle East as an Explosive Detection Dog Handler in the private security industry but then (as you do) got back into the comic scene in 2008, when he lettered a small 6 page project called "Camouflage" written by Martin Conaghan (Fallen Heroes), later lettering Martin's Graphic Novel Burke and Hare.
He now works on a number of projects for various publishers, and his most recent have been comics for the Unseen Shadows Universe, and a Graphic Novel about the life of Aleister Crowley.

NOW, let's check out the comics! :)

PLUS Team Geek-Girl Ltd Print!

Red Hot Collectors Pack featuring Brand New yet-to-be-released comics graced with covers by Geek-Girl #5's cover artist Sun Khamunaki - Van Helsing #50, Robyn Hood 2020 Annual: Worlds Apart, Courier: Liberty & Death #1; plus Geek-Girl #5 Ltd Virgin Edn and Geek-Girl #5 Deluxe 'Striking' Ltd Edn; and the Geek-Girl #5 Deluxe Digital Edition FREE so you can keep your comics pristine.

Cabra Cini will be playing a major role in upcoming issues of Geek-Girl, and Cabra Cini: Voodoo Junkie Hitwoman #0 is also now available as an Add-On.
This just in! We've hit our first Stretch Goal, so the Geek-Girl Crossover Ltd Print now comes FREE with ALL Collectors Pack Rewards! 

GG and our Guest-Star from Geek-Girl #5, Guano Guy are in - and now you can VOTE for any character you'd like to be added (Marvel, DC, Star Wars, anyone), and for every further Stretch Goal we hit, the then-most-voted for character will (pending approval) get drawn into the work-in-progress Print! 

You can Vote at the Geek-Girl Comics Facebook Group here! And keep an eye on our Kickstarter Updates to see which characters get added!

campaign.story:
The Raytoons Cartoons Avenue Comics Magazine #2  will be printed through Print Ninja!
Hi! My name is Raymond Mullikin! (I am the cartoon guy in the red shirt.) I'm the Creative Director (as well as an artist/writer) of the Raytoons Comics Avenue Comic Series...
The is magazine is for kids, and even features comics and artwork created by kids.
The comic magazine  is supported by Cuesta College and Outschool. I am an actual credential teacher on Outschool (and Cuesta's Community Programs). I teach classes on Coding Video Games, as well how get comics published...
You can check out my Cartooning, Coding and Publishing classes here. 
Inside each issue of "Raytoons Cartoon Avenue", you will find...
⚡ A zany comic intro by Ray Mullikin, featuring himself as cartoon character. 
⚡ A comic story by Ray Mullikin. Often times it will feature his goofy mice.
⚡ Comic strips by Ray Mullikin and other creators. 
⚡ Interviews with different cartoonists and illustrators. The interviews are in a comic book format, with the interviewer drawn by Ray Mullikin and the interviewee drawn by the guest artist. 
⚡ Previews of comic books and/or graphic novels by different creators.
⚡ Comics and artwork created by kids! 
The kids worked hard at creating great comics for others to read! These comics are by kids from schools all over the USA and Canada! 
Actual kids working on the comic pages...
An actual kid working on the comic book...
And here are examples of the kind of comics that you might find in the magazine...(The examples below were from the pages of the 2007 edition that I made years back.)
Please note that the upcoming Raytoons Cartoon Avenue Comic will be in Color, not Black and White.
THE CREATIVE TEAM
Raymond Mullikin, the creator of Raytoons Comics, has been drawing cartoons since he was 5 years old. For much of his life, he has drawn cartoons of himself in his essays, notes, and school projects, doing the narration.
Over the years Ray (including his cartoon version of himself) have showed up on websites, comic books, and film festivals. (You can find him at the Raytoons Website at raytoons.net) Now, he has collaborated with other artists to bring this character to life in an ongoing comic book anthology series, called "Raytoons Cartoon Avenue".
Raymond has a very dedicated team for his comic projects. Some are professionals in their field... and all are excellent at their work. I am glad to count them as part of the team.
 Raymond Mullikin - Writer / Creative Director / Lettering
 Kevin Erickson - Artist and occasional writer for most of the Raytoons intros (and some of the Miced stories)
 Alex Hoffman - Inking / Coloring for most of Raymond's projects
 Andrew Han - Artist (For some of the Raytoons short stories.)
 Nick Palazzo - Artist (For some of the Miced stories.)
 Carla Mullikin - Assistant Editor
 James Mullikin - Assists with some of the Graphics Editing
 Raytoons Cartoon Avenue is also an "open-artist" project. That means we are open to other artists and writers contributing to our projects. We also do "publishing publishing" with other creators.
Don't see enough Raytoons stuff here? Want to see more? Or maybe information about other upcoming Raytoons projects?
I also post the latest updates on twitter. Information sometimes shows up here before it shows up anyplace else...

campaign.story:
Wailing Blade is high-adrenaline fantasy adventure, set in the dark future of mankind.
 When his father is sentenced to death at the hands of the legendary Headtaker, bandit prince Tychon must find a way to save him, or fall to the Wailing Blade himself.
Plus, for the first time ever, you can get your hands on the... 
WAILING BLADE #1 - CREATOR'S EDITION 
And for the ULTIMATE COLLECTOR Ready to Take the Blade with both hands...
WAILING BLADE: HEADTAKER COLLECTOR'S BOX
Intrigued?
Let us tell you more about this extraordinary book!
SYNOPSES
Thousands of years after mankind’s fall from the stars, the remnants of humanity live under the brutal thumb of tyrannical rulers who wield futuristic technology that to the masses, is indistinguishable from magic.
These petty warlords squabble over the dwindling resources of a dying earth, while they themselves bow down to the Tyrant of Minturn, who crushes all who oppose him with his legendary executioners – warriors who wield the deadliest weapons from mankind’s starfaring days.
The most feared of these executioners is the Head Taker, who wields the mighty and unstoppable Wailing Blade – a sword which screams louder than the victims it beheads.
Each year, he travels the breadth of the Tyrant’s empire, dispensing justice and enforcing his will.
Standing against the Tyrant are scattered clans of bandits, like the Windcleavers.
Desperate scavengers, they defy the Tyrant by raiding his caravans, and keeping forbidden technology for themselves.
Their prince, Tychon, sees an opportunity to pluck a great prize from the Tyrant’s grasp, setting himself on a path that leads to a confrontation with death itself, and the WAILING BLADE!

Who will love Wailing Blade?
Fans of Conan, Elric, Masters of the Universe and other sword & sorcery epics.
People who like Mad Max, The Dying Earth, and other tales of dark futures.
Collectors of superior quality modern independent graphic novels from a world-class team of up-and-comers and industry veterans!
If you like your comics with tons of action, over-the-top weaponry, and mind-blowing visuals, THIS IS YOUR BOOK!
What Exactly Do You Get When You Take the Blade and Back This Campaign?
 Wailing Blade Volume 1: Headtaker is a 144-page collection in standard American comic size, on printed on high-quality paper.
 Wailing Blade Volume 1: Headtaker is available in three amazing options -- A super affordable direct market softcover edition, a ComixTribe-Exclusive "Virgin" Wrap-Around softcover trade, and a premium limited edition foil-enhanced, die-cut hardcover.
This volume collects the entire critically acclaimed mini-series originally released in the direct market in single issue format as WAILING BLADE #1-4. 
 Wailing Blade: Headtaker features a foreword written by Batman & The Outsiders and Titans writer Brian Edward Hill, who calls Wailing Blade "a beautiful, volatile reaction, a combination of medieval storytelling and visionary technology... a visionary ride that pulls you through its world." 
⚔️📜 PLUS: This Volume also includes an all-new LEGENDS OF THE WAILING BLADE collection of tavern-tales and yarns that reveal the origins of the legendary weapon, as told and illustrated by top creators in the world of indie comics! (STAY TUNED AS WE REVEAL CREATOR CONTRIBUTORS THROUGHOUT THIS CAMPAIGN!) 
 NEW COLLECTION EXCLUSIVE: This new volume contains a thrilling, never-before-published FINAL SCENE that was not included in the single issue release that fans of this series will not want to miss as it includes the first appearance of TWO more of the Tyrant's merciless EXECUTIONERS!
All backers will also receive loads of additional bonus content in the Tyrant's Cut Digital Deluxe PDF and the Wailing Blade Original Theme Heavy Metal Anthem MP3 by "Making Metal With" George O'Connor! 
 NEW! Wailing Blade #1 - CREATOR'S EDITION is an all-new, campaign exclusive printing of the smash-hit first issue, featuring a side-by-side look at acclaimed writer Rich Douek's script next to artist Joe Mulvey's immaculate black & white line art! This also includes the original Wailing Blade pitch greenlit by ComixTribe and bonus process sketches, making it a must have for writers, artists and comic book process junkies! Each book will be numbered and signed by Joe and I. (**SPECIAL ADD-ON ITEM! Can be added to ANY Pledge Level!**) 
Or take the blade to a whole new level when you get ALL FOUR NEW BOOKS plus a whole lot more in a limited edition WAILING BLADE: HEADTAKER Collector's Box! 
At highest levels, limited opportunities to get custom sketches, stories, signed materials, and the chance to be EXECUTED BY THE HEADTAKER YOURSELF! 
The Comics Industry Picked Up the Wailing Blade... and LOVES IT! Here's What Critics & Pros are Saying About This Series...

Check out More Reviews for the Book: 
"A brutally bloody take on Sci-fi/ fantasy that doesn't hold back... Wailing Blade is the Executioner Sci-Fi Fantasy You Didn’t Know You Needed..." - Geek.com
"Loved it! 5 out of 5 stars..." - TheNewestRant.com
 "A Bloody, Brutal Blend Of Fantasy & Sci-Fi..." - Comicon.com
"Wailing Blade has a swagger to it... a lot of fun and a strong start." - Omnicomic.com
"Wailing Blade is the kind of comic that Image was built on in the late 90's. " - GWW.com 
"Wailing Blade is Terminator with a touch of fantasy, Rich Douek and Joe Mulvey bring it all in this fantastic debut... engrossing and full of action..." - Thecomiclounge.com 
AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, HERE'S HOW COMIC FANS AND RETAILERS HAVE REACTED TO WAILING BLADE:
We create for the fans, and the fans help us create, which is why we're here!  
Feast Your Eyes on These Pages Inside the Book...
Wailing Blade features breathtaking fantasy vistas... a vivid, dangerous dark future world you've never scene before, as depicted in this scene from WAILING BLADE #1:
Some of the most brutal, bloody fight sequences ever committed to the comic book page, as in this scene here from WAILING BLADE #2:
And one of the biggest, action-set showdowns between TWO fearsome executioners, the unstoppable HEADTAKER vs. the merciless BONEBREAKER, shown here in WAILING BLADE #4: 
Want to See Even More Before You Take the Blade?
We are SO CONFIDENT in our book and believe that if you TAKE THE BLADE you won't want to let go, which is why we're making the entire, extra-sized issue WAILING BLADE #1 available for you absolutely free! 
If you'd like to read even more of Wailing Blade before you back this campaign, we invite you to download THE ENTIRE Oversized FIRST ISSUE absolutely FREE!
⚔️ CLICK HERE TO GET WAILING BLADE #1 FOR FREE ⚔️  
 Who are the Creators Behind the Screaming Blood-soaked Thrill Ride That is Wailing Blade? 
Wailing Blade is an action-packed, dystopian future fever dream created by Rich Douek (Road of Bones, Sea of Sorrows) and Joe Mulvey (SCAM).
Rich Douek
Rich is an award-winning copywriter, and the creator of the independent comic series, Gutter Magic. He has worked on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Universe comics for IDW, and has published short stories in the New York Times-featured All We Ever Wanted anthology, for A Wave Blue World, as well as anthologies for Comixtribe and Red Stylo press. Additonally, he is a moderator of the Comics Experience Creator's Workshop, where he strives to help newer creators learn how to create their own comics and navigate the industry.
Joe Mulvey
Joe made his comics debut as the writer and illustrator of the electrifying super-powered Vegas heist series Scam, from ComixTribe. He is also the writer, artist and creator of the acclaimed children's book Mummy's Always Right, and was published in the Where We Live Anthology from Image Comics. His next series, Happy Hill, will be published by ComixTribe soon! 
Christopher Sotomayor
Chris has been a mainstay at Marvel and DC Comics since 1996 working on titles like Captain America, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, Nightwing, Detective Comics, SuperGirl and pretty much everything else at one point or another.  In addition to working for every major comic publisher in the business, Chris also teaches a course on digital coloring for comics at http://www.comicsexperience.com.  Stay in school. Don't do drugs.
Taylor Esposito
Taylor is a comic book lettering professional and owner of Ghost Glyph Studios. As a staff letterer at DC, he lettered titles such as Red Hood and The Outlaws, Constantine, Bodies, CMYK, and New Suicide Squad. Prior to this, Taylor was credited on numerous titles for Marvel as a production artist. He is currently working on a new batch of creator-owned titles, such as Interceptor: Reactor and Friendo (Vault Comics), Exorsisters and Jook Joint (Image), and Babyteeth (Aftershock). Other publishers he has worked with include Line Webtoon (Acursian, Finality) Dynamite (Battlestar Galactica, Rainbow Brite, Army of Darkness/Bubba Ho-Tep), and IDW (Scarlett’s Strike Force).
Rich writes:
For me, growing up, my favorite books were the ones that transported me to different lands. Wild adventures I could get lost in as I followed the heroes along on their journey. Middle Earth, Hyboria, The Young Kingdoms, The Dying Earth. To me, it's not escapism to want to dwell in worlds like that for a little while. The wonderful thing about fiction, especially genre fiction is that it gives you a taste of the impossible - a window into another world. And that feeling, that exhilarating feeling of cracking open a book and getting lost in it, even for a moment, is something that I've always wanted to create for someone else. And I believe that Wailing Blade is a book that will.
It's often said that you should make the comics that you want to see in the world. In that respect, Wailing Blade is everything we've ever wanted to see in a comic. It's got action, it's got adventure. Compelling characters, and a lush, vibrant world for them to inhabit. We couldn't be happier to share it with you.
What Exactly Is This Kickstarter For?

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The support of backers on Kickstarter has been instrumental to the success of ComixTribe since our very first project back in 2012.

Our success would not have been possible without the support of thousands of backers like you over the years, many who have come back launch after launch to support us...

So you better believe we take the trust of our backers very seriously.

We've taken a number of actions to mitigate risk associated with this campaign, including completing the creation of the book prior to launching and establishing a strong relationship with a quality printer who has done great work for us in the past and known for a hands on attention to detail and quality craftsmanship.

Every Kickstarter campaign comes with risks, unforeseen hiccups, and lessons learned...and we've certainly learned valuable lessons from every past campaign.

During this time of global uncertainty, we realize that steady communication with our backers throughout the campaign and fulfillment process is key... and should any unforeseen issues cause delays, our backers will be the first to know.

We're committed to delivering a superior reward delivery experience for our backers, so we're investing in the best protective shipping materials for comics and collectibles, and handling fulfillment 100% in-house, to eliminate the risk of delivery delays and to make sure your pledges arrive in great condition.

ComixTribe and the WAILING BLADE team have a long track record of delivering the goods, and the fact that we enjoy so much support from returning backers is testament to that.

So we invite you to back with confidence, as we want to be entertaining you for years to come.

campaign.story:
Asano Naganori, lord of Ako, begins his fateful trip to Edo leaving Yoshio to protect Ako in his absence. Kira's plot begins to unfold and a sinister force is loosed upon the people of Ako. As Asano and his entourage depart, Kira's agent incites the Grey Wolf to strike!  Journey with us as we go back in time and examine the story of the forty-seven!
47 Furious Tails is a 12 issue limited comic series that tells the classic tale of the 47 ronin.  This thrilling tale from the history off Japan is beautifully illustrated with the characters depicted as anthropomorphic animals by the remarkable Alexia Veldhuisen. This full color, 20 page issue brings us back to Ako as Asano Naganori begins his fateful trip to Edo. Enjoy this thrilling journey back to the Edo period as we tell a story of furious samurai action!
Page 1
Interior page by Alexia Veldhuisen
This campaign raises funds for final art costs, lettering, printing and shipping for 47 Furious Tails, Issue Two. 
 Rewards and Add-Ons: 
Reward tiers are very exciting for this campaign.  I've been selected to participate in KickStarter's beta-test for its new 'add-on' feature.  I'm using this feature to make things as user friendly as possible. I've added 5.5 by 8.5 art prints, the variant covers and 11 by 17 art prints as add-ons so you have the power to pick and choose the rewards you want.  

Tiers begin with digital copies of issues one & Two as well as a signed copy of 47 Furious Tails, Issue two. All tiers include shipping within the United States and the territories.  For international backers an additional amount is appended in the pledge manager to help cover the added shipping costs.












$8000 ~ Adds a new 5.5 by 8.5 inch print featuring the Fernando Ruiz variant cover!

The Team
W.S. "Sam" Quinton: Writer/creator, publisher, KickStarter guy

Alexia Veldhuisen ~ Principle artist / colorist (interiors and first cover), and editor / Kubert School Alumnus
Aysegül SInav: Flatter (interior art)/ Kubert School Alumnus
Brian Lee - Letterer / Kubert School Alumnus
Paul Walcott - Cover 2 (Art & Color) / Kubert School Alumnus
The legendary Fernando Ruiz: Cover Three Artist / Instructor at the Kubert School
Nick Caponi ~ Colorist for Cover Three / Kubert School Alumnus
Mariano ~ Flatter (Third Cover) / current Kubert School Student
47 Furious Tails is printed in 6 by 9 inch digest format.  The cover is a hefty 130 lb satin paper stock with a soft touch finish.  The interior pages are 80 lb satin paper stock. These are the same high grade materials that were selected and used for issue one.  These comics feel amazing in your hands and are crafted to last. Yes, this is the same paper stock that was used for issue one.
This comic is being printed through Mixam, for premium paper stock and fantastic reliability.  
Founded in 2017, Sinopa Publishing LLC is registered in the Commonwealth of Kentucky.  My little company exists to publish role playing games, comic books and children books.  I operate by funding product creation through crowdfunding campaigns and pay my artists/contributors fair wages.
Since 2017 I have successfully funded and fulfilled several campaigns under this (my private account) and the Sinopa Publishing account (set up so I can hand it down to my children one day).  When you support one of my projects you can be certain that you will receive your pledge rewards.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've been fulfilling KickStarter campaigns since 2017 thanks to all the backers who have supported my campaigns. I take my fulfillment obligations very seriously and will get your rewards to you. Even with the best precautions/preparations there are always challenges to overcome. Below are some things I would like to make everyone aware of. 

 ~Challenges~
Backer Survey/Shipping:
Please fill out your backer survey as soon it goes out so I have the information I need in order to send your rewards to you. This will help me out A LOT as I'll have the information needed for shipping.

International backers will most likely see a delay in receipt of shipments due to Covid-19 restrictions. International shipping is appended in the pledge manager. All international shipping is via USPS international mail. 

Printing:
47 Furious Tails is printed through Mixam. In my experience they have always been reliable with impeccable customer service for resolution of issues (Like the time I had a shipment of prints arrived damaged, they had new prints to me in less than a week!)

Art/Lettering:
Art is almost done and Lettering is underway. I expect this issue to be completed before this KickStarter campaign ends. This should not be an issue.

Most of the art prints have already arrived from the printer. Copies of issue one, the second printing, are on hand as well. 

Short version: Risks are minimal, low probability, and basically consist of death of team members, War, and/or apocalypse type occurrences.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
It all began 65 million years ago… just kidding.
Setting - Current Day:
While on an archaeological dig, two archaeologists, Maxwell Trakkar and Amanda Wilson, and their interns, Christian Trakkar and Shelby McNamara discover an orb that doesn’t belong in the grasp of a fifty million year old fossil. Come to find out this little “rock” is in actuality an alien homing beacon for some previous inhabitants, that just so happen to be the relatives of our Earth dinosaurs. Aboard their ship, The Megalodon, Tor and his team of his misfits known as the Dino-Thrashers arrive from the planet Reptilia and greet the humans that have drawn them to this location. The Dino-Thrashers have been patiently waiting for years for that button to be pressed, but for reasons that are unbeknownst to all others. Joined by his team composed of five other members: Trips, a Triceratops and second in command, Tigrella, a female sabre-tooth tiger whose mouth is even faster than her running ability. Dirus, a Dire-wolf who has seen some battle and has the scars to prove it, but gets through it all with comedy since he’s not the brightest bulb in the lamp. Glide, the comic relief of the team and a Pterodactyl and sniper of the team. And finally Snapper, a giant snapping turtle who is the technology genius and medic that keeps them all from going extinct.
Noah’s Inks on the Dino Thrashers
Knowing that another group of not so kind dinosaurs have made their way to Earth, Tor and his team take it upon themselves to make sure they bring them off world. The Terrorsaurs led by the evil and villainous Julius Rex, were once part of the same team of the Dino-Thrashers back on Reptilia, until there was a falling out between the two faction leaders. Joined up with the most ruthless and power hungry billionaire on the planet, Samuel Rhodes, the Terrorsaurs are looking for more than just money on earth. Standing by Rex’s miserable side are his team of numb-skulls: Croc-shot, an overgrown crocodile, who is Rex’s number two and he is treated like a number two most of the time. Brachs is a Brachiosaurus who loves to see things blow up, too bad his brain is the size of a pea and his hand - eye coordination is not even close to 20-20. Jarbeak is a female Pterodactyl that is the recon for the team and always puts her team first, even if she doesn’t believe she has to. Dade is a prehistoric boar known as a Daeodon and to say his brain is the size of a pea would be to give him credit, he may be as strong as a house of bricks, but that’s about all he has in his head, but is loyal to Rex to a fault. Tusk is a woolly mammoth that will beat your behind to a pulp and then as the medic of the team, fix you right up to beat your butt again.
Thrilling Dinosaur Action!
With lots of nostalgia for the 80’s and 90’s comics like anything Marvel, DC, TMNT, this is the comic that you are going to want to pick up. Filled with action, comedy, fun and nothing short of spectacular battle scenes! Dinosaurs with guns, axes, knives, alien technology with wit quicker then the asteroid that hit earth so many years ago, and comedy for days!
Just a few of the concept sketches by Noah Ray of the crazy cast of characters in Dino Thrashers!

campaign.story:
BRZRKR is the first comic book and graphic novel series from the iconic Keanu Reeves, who makes his comic book writing debut alongside New York Times best-selling co-writer Matt Kindt (Folklords, Justice League of America), superstar artist Ron Garney (Wolverine, Captain America),  Eisner and Harvey Award-nominated colorist Bill Crabtree (BPRD), and letterer Clem Robins (Hellboy) in a brutally violent new series about one immortal warrior’s fight through the ages.
Interior art by Ron Garney & Bill Crabtree. All art shown during campaign is not final and subject to change. Final product may differ slightly from what is shown.
The man known only as Berzerker is half-mortal and half-God, cursed and compelled to violence...even at the sacrifice of his sanity. But after wandering the world for centuries, Berzerker may have finally found a refuge – working for the U.S. government to fight the battles too violent and too dangerous for anyone else. In exchange, Berzerker will be granted the one thing he desires – the truth about his endless blood-soaked existence…and how to end it.
Cover art by Rafael Grampá. All art shown during campaign is not final and subject to change. Final product may differ slightly from what is shown.
If you love intense, savage characters with mysterious pasts like Wolverine and John Wick, Berzerker is sure to be your next favorite warrior! 
Please note: BRZRKR is an action-packed, high octane comic book series with depictions of graphic violence, blood, and gore.
Timeline
BRZRKR will be released in 12 epic comic book chapters and collected in 3 beautiful graphic novel volumes, each containing 4 comic book chapters (issues). Each graphic novel is a 7”x10”, 128 page full color book. Through this Kickstarter, we are offering the opportunity to pre-order all 3 graphic novels (384 pages total!) and receive them directly to your home as they are released in September 2021 (Volume 1), April 2022 (Volume 2), and September 2022 (Volume 3).
Softcover set shown. All art shown during campaign is not final and subject to change. Final product may differ slightly from what is shown.
Kickstarter allows fans to pre-order all 3 books with a single purchase and allows us to fulfill them as they are produced and released to the public. When you pre-order on Kickstarter, you can rest assured you will receive the complete story of BRZRKR direct to your door. 
 At BOOM! Studios, we believe comic books and graphic novels are the greatest form of storytelling in the world! We’re passionate about helping new fans and potential readers discover their first comic book or graphic novel.
When we partnered with Keanu Reeves on his first comic book, we knew we had an amazing opportunity to reach new audiences. We’re excited to join forces with Kickstarter to introduce people who have never read a comic book or bought a graphic novel to the endless world of storytelling possibilities of comics.
Cover art by Mark Brooks. All art shown during campaign is not final and subject to change. Final product may differ slightly from what is shown.
And for the superfans, we’re also offering the opportunity to pre-order premium and limited edition versions of the graphic novel collections, including a number of versions exclusive to Kickstarter!
Gunmetal edition shown. All art shown during campaign is not final and subject to change. Final product may differ slightly from what is shown.
For those of you that love having a super premium, limited edition version to fully celebrate your fandom, Kickstarter gives us the opportunity to offer beautiful deluxe editions that traditionally might only be available as exclusives at comic conventions. 
 Most importantly, we can’t wait to share our excitement for BRZRKR, the storytelling art form of comic books, and our love of the comics community through updates in Kickstarter. We hope that by pre-ordering BRZRKR and participating in this campaign, you’ll (a) have a lot of fun and (b) fall in love with the limitless world of comic books and graphic novels.  


 We’ve prepared eight stretch goals to make the shared experience of pre-ordering BRZRKR more exciting and fun, but also as a way of saying “thank you” to the fans. Each time we unlock a stretch goal by meeting a certain pre-order goal, new features will be added to various tiers or release a shared reward for the fans who have pre-ordered through Kickstarter.
Cover art by Rafael Grampá. All art shown during campaign is not final and subject to change. Final product may differ slightly from what is shown.
The basic graphic novel set will remain the same throughout the campaign, so if you want to capture any of the stretch goals make sure to check out the other pre-order options.
The stretch goals will be hidden until the campaign goal is reached, and we'll start revealing them as the campaign progresses. You can help us unlock additional goals by sharing a link from our Kickstarter page to your website, blog, or social media page. Sharing this pre-order campaign with others will ensure that more people have an opportunity to pre-order and everyone will benefit with new rewards. We hope to unlock all of the goals by the end of the campaign so we can make all of our wild ideas happen!  

 Anyone who pre-orders through the Kickstarter campaign will have an opportunity to add-on additional items through CrowdOx after the end of the campaign.
For example: if you pre-order the limited edition softcover set, but you also want a copy of the limited edition hardcover set, you’ll be able to add that to your pre-order after the campaign ends.
Another example: if you preorder the limited edition hardcover set, but want to pre-order an additional copy as a gift for a friend, you’ll be able to add that on to your pre-order after the campaign ends. 
 After the campaign ends, your shipping will be calculated based on your pre-order and shipping address. Shipping fees are not included in your pre-order. Rather, all shipping will be charged after the campaign ends, just before each graphic novel ships.This will allow us to charge the lowest possible shipping fees based on where and when the graphic novel ships.
Each graphic novel will ship separately as it is released to ensure you receive it as early as possible. Because of this we cannot use a one-size-fits-all approach to shipping and pre-orders will be sent out in waves (more on that below), and shipping will be charged to you based on how many packages you receive and the total weight in each package.
Interior art by Ron Garney & Bill Crabtree. All art shown during campaign is not final and subject to change. Final product may differ slightly from what is shown.
 We’ve included some estimated shipping costs below for many parts of the world, so that you have a sense of what the shipping costs may be when they are charged. These are only estimates and shipping costs may go up or down before the actual shipping occurs.
Please note that Total Shipping costs reflect the total you will pay for shipping and handling for your pre-order. For international orders, please note that your country might have additional customs fees. We do not collect those. Please check your local regulations for that information.
We will do our best to minimize shipping costs!

Wave 1
When BRZRKR Volume 1 graphic novel is finished, we will verify all backers’ addresses – including addresses outside of the United States – then provide this information to our fulfillment partner who will ship your books packaged in a box directly to you. Any metal boxes and prints will be shipped at this time. We expect Wave 1 to ship in September 2021.
Wave 2
When BRZRKR Volume 2 graphic novel is finished, we will re-verify all backers’ addresses – including addresses outside of the United States – then provide this information to our fulfillment partner who will ship your books packaged in a box directly to you. We expect Wave 2 to ship in April 2022.
Wave 3
When BRZRKR Volume 3 graphic novel is finished, we will once again re-verify all backers’ addresses – including addresses outside of the United States – then provide this information to our fulfillment partner who will ship your books packaged in a box directly to you. We expect Wave 3 to ship in September 2022.
About BOOM! Studios
We are BOOM! Studios.
It’s a big, bold name. That boldness is no accident, it’s embedded in the DNA of who we are.
We love comic books. We believe comics are capable of telling any kind of story. We are storytellers. We believe that the medium of comic books is the greatest way to tell our stories.
We were founded by Ross Richie in 2005 with the singular focus of creating world-class comic book and graphic novel storytelling for all audiences. Through the development of four distinct imprints—BOOM! Studios, BOOM! Box, KaBOOM!, and Archaia—BOOM! has produced award-winning original work, including Lumberjanes, Once & Future, Something is Killing The Children, Giant Days, and Mouse Guard, while also breaking new ground with established licenses such as Buffy The Vampire Slayer, Firefly, WWE, Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, Dune, and The Jim Henson Company properties.
We get up every day excited to create new fans, readers, and customers for comic book stories.
We all need stories. Stories that help us reconnect with our humanity, that capture our imaginations, that help us make sense of the world around us, stories that allow us to escape, and stories that inspire us.
We believe that the stories we tell matter and we want as many people to read them as possible. Whether you are one of the millions of people who have never read a comic book or are looking for that first comic to share with someone in your life, we want to help you Discover Yours.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
BOOM! Studios has been publishing comic books and graphic novels for over 15 years, so we’re very experienced in the production and timely release of books and limited editions. As a matter of fact, in 2019, 98% of everything we published was released on time! BRZRKR the series is in active production already with scripts, line art, colored art, covers, and lettering complete. 

We’re confident that the creative work, printing, and design on these graphic novels will be of the highest quality. The highest quality in storytelling requires careful craftsmanship, from writing the stories to hand illustrating them, bringing them to vivid life with color, and making sure they’re lettered properly for a great reading experience. Our printing partner and our fulfillment partner are top notch and both organizations we’ve worked with for years. Our delivery dates may seem far off in the future, but they reflect the realities of producing the content and delivering it to everyone on time. 

That being said, as we’ve seen from world events this year, it has become increasingly difficult to predict larger disruptions to our supply chain. If we have to delay or hit pause on our production timeline in order to keep people safe, we will do so, in an effort to stay safe and keep others safe. Absent that we will do our best to deliver your pre-ordered books as quickly as possible and on time!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
